description:
A good deed is repaid ,a dog rewards a kind master, a bumpkin gets the last laugh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hebi to Kitsune no Ongaeshi / Hanasaka Jii-san / Kiji to Karasu
Snake and Fox Repay a Debt / The Old Man Who Made the Dead Trees Blossom / The Pheasant and the Crow
ヘビと狐の恩返し / 花さか爺さん / キジとカラス
